mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rent_contract_id AS "rentContractId", a.electric_Self_Amt AS "electricSelfAmt", a.electric_share_Amt AS "electricShareAmt", a.water_amt AS "waterAmt", a.gas_amt AS "gasAmt", a.tv_amt AS "tvAmt", a.net_amt AS "netAmt", a.service_amt AS "serviceAmt", a.pay_date AS "payDate", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", u2.login_name AS "updateBy.loginName", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", tc.contract_name as "contractName"
left join t_rent_contract tc on a.rent_contract_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_postpaid_fee( id, rent_contract_id, pay_date, pay_status, electric_Self_Amt, electric_share_Amt, water_amt, gas_amt, tv_amt, net_amt, service_amt, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rentContractId}, #{payDate}, #{payStatus}, #{electricSelfAmt}, #{electricShareAmt}, #{waterAmt}, #{gasAmt}, #{tvAmt}, #{netAmt}, #{serviceAmt}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_postpaid_fee SET rent_contract_id = #{rentContractId}, pay_date = #{payDate}, pay_status = #{payStatus}, electric_Self_Amt = #{electricSelfAmt}, electric_share_Amt = #{electricShareAmt}, water_amt = #{waterAmt}, gas_amt = #{gasAmt}, tv_amt = #{tvAmt}, net_amt = #{netAmt}, service_amt= #{serviceAmt}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
